name: SwiftSPICE
description: A Swift package that provides a Swift wrapper for NASA's SPICE Toolkit. Allows users to load state vectors of celestial bodies and perform various calculations, such as position, velocity, and light time corrections.

name: Redefining Crowdwork with LLM-Powered Digital Twins
description: A research project that explores the use of "digital twins" – AI representations of human crowdworkers – to automatically fill out surveys and other tasks. Project for COS436 (Human-Computer Interaction) at Princeton University.

name: Planetaria Star [2021 Swift Student Challenge Winner]
description: A Swift playground that allows users to learn about stars in the universe.
